thread.title: Manchester United boss Jose Mourinho dismisses notion he can restore Red Devils to former glory - "Forget it!"
thread.title_full: Manchester United boss Jose Mourinho dismisses notion he can restore Red Devils to former glory - "Forget it!"

author: Jake Polden
title: Manchester United boss Jose Mourinho dismisses notion he can restore Red Devils to former glory - "Forget it!"
text:
Get Chelsea FC updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Jose Mourinho dismissed the idea he can restore Manchester United to it's former glory, telling Gary Lineker: "Forget it!" 
The Portuguese was talking on the Premier League Show on BBC Two, where he discussed his long-term aspirations as manager of the club. 
In the interview, which you can watch above, Lineker asked Mourinho whether he hopes to have a long and successful career like Sir Alex Ferguson. 
But the former Chelsea manager suggested that what the Scot achieved is impossible to recreate and instead Mourinho considers something else to be more important. Jose Mourinho explained a good relationship with the fans is important to him (Photo: AFP) 
"Forget it! It's not possible don't try to go 10, 20 years ago, because it's not possible anymore," explained the Portuguese. 
"I have many, many doubts that dominance is going to be back in the Premier League. 
"So win titles, try to get back to the Champions League, try to win in Europe. 
"But the base has to be the empathy with the fans and the empathy with the fans is based on the quality of our football. The Portuguese is not expecting to recreate what Sir Alex Ferguson achieved (Photo: Getty) Mourinho guided Man United to an EFL Cup win this season (Photo: AMA/Getty) 
"So this is something that has to be the basis of eveything." 
In the same interview, Mourinho also spoke about the challenges of being Man United manager, and suggested poor decisions, prior to his takeover in May 2016, made his job harder. poll loading Will Manchester United win the Premier League under Jose Mourinho? 2000+ VOTES SO FAR
